text:
(a)     The Controller shall promulgate any rules and regulations necessary or appropriate for the implementation of this section.
     (b)     All contracts, grant agreements, and loan agreements shall incorporate this Chapter by reference.
(Added by Proposition Q, 11/5/2002)

chapter.text: PROHIBITION ON USE OF PUBLIC FUNDS FOR POLITICAL ACTIVITY BY RECIPIENTS OF CITY CONTRACTS, GRANTS, AND LOANS
